short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Faceit Exts is a extension improve experience and adds some features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Show ELO estimation for match (included HUB)
- Auto accept invite / ready match
- Auto close annoying modal (update ranking, match end )
- Show elo progress
- Show elo change history in stats
- Add button download demo in table history match
- Add banned history in player profile
- Add auto copy server data
- Add auto connect server
---- Create an issse if any: https://github.com/leedrum/faceit-exts/issues
